content.detailedDescription: My name is richard r. sylvester, j.D., ph.D. (310) 391-2080, 4253beethovenstreet, los angeles, ca 90066. my wifes name is irene l.Sylvester.On dec. 28,2000, my wife and i were driving north on sepulveda blvd, afew blocks north ofsunset blvd.  at 7:44 pm we saw a very bright greendiamond shape, moving veryfast, downward on a 45 degree angle,right toleft.The shape first became visableat the top of our windshield, andand was last seen just before the mountainsobscured further vision.The trajectory was a slight curve, from high straightahead to thehorizon,from right to left, travelling the total distance in about 2seconds.We heardno noise3b we saw no contrail.  the sky was clear.   by comparison,aircraftwere merepoints of light moving slowly, but this was very large,bright,26 fast.We reported our sighting to radio station kfwb 980 at about 8:30 pmthesame evening3b the person at the station said there were other reports ofthe same event,including a report from woodland hills, which is about20 miles northwest fromwhere we saw the green fast-moving object in thesky.We were surprised to seesuch a clearly defined shape, and the color.By contrast, most celestial objectshave a warm color (yellow ororange), a round shape, and move very slowly.
content.summary: Bright green diamond shape, moving very fast,12/28

content.detailedDescription: This case file concerns an event that was witnessed by 5 members of the georgiahaunt hunt team (ghht) on 26nov00. this group specializes in conductinginvestigations of haunted sites and other supernatural events.  they applyscientific methodology and a professional approach in their field work, muchlike is done in mufon.  two members of this team are also members of mufon ofgeorgia, one being olivia newton of lilburn, a ssd and fi for mufonga.  sheimplimented and continued this investigation due to the fact that others besidesherself were witness to the event.  case coordinator and wufod entry by sd tomsheets.

content.detailedDescription: Were traveling home(north west),it was a clear and near dusk. noticed the onlystar in the sky was far off and yellowish-white in color.Watch light remainderor ride(5mins). seemed to be getting closer.Pulled into yard,ran into house toget binoculars.Back outside to find light had dissapeared. sec. later alarge,dark triangle floated over barn at rooftop height.Passed overdriveway.Could see gurder type structuring underneath and white lights incenter and corners. object slowly floated over trees and away towards the southeast. appeared to be very thin, a single row of small darker colored squaresseen along entire side that was visible.Enter your narrative description here(you can type over these instructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words(equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: Triangular object flew over barn

content.detailedDescription: We were driving to tacoma from concrete washington upon entering seattle we sawwhat looked like policecar lights up in the sky, within visual range of a largecomercial aircraft. definately within setacs radar range.It came from the eastand accelerated suddenly (about 1 full second) from helicopter speed to fullthrottle jet fighter speedtoward the coast it took about 20 seconds to cover thedistance. once over the water it did a 180 and came back about half the originalflight path then did a 90 degree turn toward the south and moved out of sight.The entire time it was visible was anywhere from 1 to 6 minutes i wish i couldbe more specific but i never looked at my watch and it seemed like a long time,but i know a minute can seem like a long time when something exiting ishappening.
content.summary: Cop car lights above seattle fast and 2, 90 degree

content.detailedDescription: (note:  didnt receive mufon forms backfrom the witness, following is the account of the sighting as posted on ms-ufofiles on 12/11/00).On the night of 12/01/00, while leaving my home (which is located in the deepwoods near the george county line about 5 miles west of hwy. 63 near cedar lake)i spotted from my truck ahead of me in the distant sky a pair of what appearedto be headlights.  i watched them for several min until the road turned in adirection which did not allow me to see them anymore.  the lights were extremelybright and since there is an airport which is located about 15 miles to thesouth of my spotting, i just assumed it to be aircraft lightslights.Two wks later i caught a program on ufos on a&e entitled ufos over indianain which the description of the object was exactly as what i had seen.  thereally strange thing is my reaction to the whole event.  this has troubled mesomewhat.  i never thought of the object again till the show triggered my memorythen bang!..All the strangeness of the sighting came to me at once.I remember thinking logically about how very large  the object would have had tobe to appear as a car with its headlights on sitting in the sky so far away.  iassumed it was quite distant since i could see no movement.  i suppose it couldhave been stationary and smaller, but that would have placed the object perhapsonly hundreds of yards away which i could see it clearly was not.  it was milesaway.I would be interested in knowing if anyone else has seen this object then orbefore, or has any rational explanation that could explain this observance.
content.summary: Sighting in jackson county, ms

content.detailedDescription: We were on vacation. i was excited about the mountains we were coming up to. ihad never seen mountains. we were not paying much attention to theaircrafts.There were several jet planes flying around on what we thought wereprobubly training flights. i was taking pictures of the scenery not the ufo. ididnt realize i had till i had the film developed. it was an accident. myhusband had a photographer friend of his check out the picture. he couldntexplain it. it may be nothing but i would like to have it checked out.
content.summary: I have picture  with ufo that looks like your open

content.detailedDescription: I live in a remote area of the san tan mountains. not one single sighting butseveral over a 3 year period. no moon during sightings. no electrical service inthe area, so no light interference. at the time i spent almost every eveningoutside enjoying the stars and the quiet. from within the mountains i observed ahelicopter, sometimes 2 that followed this object closely. it was completelydark with no lights. a strange sound. i am familiar with aircraft and turbineengines. this was very quiet and had a strange sound. i assumed that it was anew experimental aircraft from a facility within the san tans. sometimes thesecraft headed to sacaton. there is a very strange facility near sacatonsurrounded by orchards on the reservation. it appeared that these aircraftheaded toward sacaton. after finding this facility i became intriqued.This is avery odd facility. i can show anyone the location if anyone interested. i am notclaiming that it is alien, but the facility and these sightings are interestingand may worthwhile.
content.summary: Craft at night w/ helicopter escort. facility on i

content.detailedDescription: I was going outside at 8:15 to let in the dog.  i saw 2 moving26 blinking bright lights that resembled fireflies. they changed direction inflight, didnt act like a normal aircraft. i ran inside to get my fiancee so shecould see. we were both in awe - watched for approx 45 min until their coursechanged out of our view.  these objects acted like yo-yos! they would comeclose to each other then move apart and change from solid or blinking white tosolid red. they would drop out of sight for a brief time then come straight backup into vision.  there was absolutely no sound or visible trail of any kind. the maneuvers were extremely quick and sporadic in direction.
content.summary: 2 sporadic flying objects moving all directions

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed object while stood at back door having a cigarette. looking up inoticed the object just above some trees approx 200yds away. the object wasfurther. its size approx that of the sun. it was not the sun as that would havebeen over my right shoulder and to the rear. i checked around and it was not areflection. after a while the object moved to the right. then very rapidly shotaway (decreased in size in an upward angle).During the sighting i wanted to getmy camera yet at the same time did not want to lose sight of the object by goingupstairs. when i had resolved to go then the object moved and disappeared asdescribed.
content.summary: Sun sized object in sky (not distant light) defini
Triangular formation of lights in daytime sky

content.detailedDescription: We were just getting home. my husband was unloading the truck. i turned andlooked to the east at the moon.  i saw what appeared to be 4 stars lined up in arow above the moon.I thought that was interesting so i watched and told myhusband to look. i had been watching about 30 seconds or so, when my husbandjoined me. as i was pointed out the stars to my husband, suddenly two of thembegan to move. they accelerated so rapidly that within 2 or 3 seconds, they werecompletely gone. there was no noise or other phenomenon at all, they were justgone.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: We saw two brightly lit objects take off

content.detailedDescription: At a little after four am.Roy and myself were walking into the woods on ourfamily farm,heading east south east,when we noticed a very bright light movingvery fast from north to south. we are both former military,and this was movingfaster than any thing we had ever seen.We noticed that there was no sound fromany thing.Animals wind or the craft. wewatched it for about five minutes. laterthat day, at around five pm.We saw an unmarked,c130aircraft flying east to westat about 150 feet.We could see the rivets in the underside of the wings,therewas no markings on this plane at all.It was painted flat black,had no runninglights,and flew directly over us,low and slow.Enter your narrative descriptionhere (you can type over these instructions.)please limit your narrative to 500words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: Extreamly fast craft,and unmarked black plane

content.detailedDescription: I was at the nearby arroyo (app. 1 block away) when i turned toward home. i sawa trianglular object, hovering above my appartment building. it had two, redelongated lights and three white lights(at the points). i couldnt believe whati was seeing, i thought it was a helicopter(we have a hospital nearby). i wentover to the hospital, but there was nothing there.
content.summary: Sighting a trianglular object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to meet my cousin, and while walking thru a field i looked up andsaw stars moving. there were 4 small points and 1 large. the large one firedsomething at 1 of the small ones which grew britter then winked out. 1 of thesmall ones fired at another small 1 near the big 1, which got hit then veredaway. the big 1 started firing at the other ones then all started winking out.
content.summary: Space battle

content.detailedDescription: 9/11/97or98 between 7268 pm observed a extremly bright light coming from the s.E. in a slow wide turnas if skirting the metro area. at about an angle of 75 degrees in relationshipto us the lights were shut off it continued its turn to the west. the shape wasa triangle with two lights on the front and one on each corner no flashinglights or markings, very low level buzzing sound could almost feel it. it didhave panels and i got the impression they were 60 feet by 20 feet i alsoremenber what seemed like high cloud cover. denver int. airport is about 40miles from here as the crow flies a even though the jets go or at five miles ican always here them. some how i have the impression that this was terrestialand had sound eliminating decieve operating on it as seen on discovery channelabout a year previously
content.summary: Triangle object noise seemed at ground level low b

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage).We were on top of a microwave tower near mt.St. helens we were notdistracted by the lights they appeared as stars we did notice a car racing upthe mountain they made it to the top as we scurried down as we were going downwe all noticed the lights shoot into a forested valley no access except trails ,the car at the bottom we feared were sprint personal or sheriff we thought wewere in trouble they seperated us asked what we saw they idenified themselves asairforce observers and allowed us to leave , we all conveied what they asked usit was the same q26a we did not know know untill that point that we all experienced that samething including disbelief , now this year oct 10th we all got together and reexamined the event and concured we did see and obsess over the event personallyand privetlly telling our girlfriends and wives only over the years we do allagree that one lee gamelguard of hazeldell was in fact present with myself , ed, and howard gehrke , along with the said airforce persons 2 that greeted us atthe bottom of the tower.
content.summary: Near mt st helens we saw a group of ufos and air f

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend went for a walk, we left my house at 7:00p.M. as we walkingbackto my house, we looked to the east, and saw this big,huge,black triangularshapedcraft,silently hovering. it looked like it was slowly rising up in the sky. thefirst thing that got our attention,was thered lights that was pulsating acrossthe back end of this craft. we could see that there was blue, yellow, green andwhite lights that was pulsating on thebottom of it. couldnt see direction oflights pulsating, due to trees in theway, so we ran back to my house, i got mybinoculars, ran back outside, and thecraft had slowly moved away, so we jumpedin my truck,and drove to s.W.29th andczech hall road.  when we got there, thisobject had completely disappearedfrom sight...Thank you for your time andconsideration,shelley l. ritteroklahoma mufon field investigator.
content.summary: Big black triangular shaped craft
